ext_description.p: A dependent_material_removal_feature_template is a type of that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The dependent_material_removal_feature_template shall have a description that is 'material removal feature template'.

The dependent_material_removal_feature_template shall be related to exactly one with a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', or 'default attachment size based', or 'default attachment size and via based', or 'default component termination passage based', or 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based'.
A design_object is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_description.p: An electrical_isolation_removal_template_definition is a type of that implements the ARM concept of .

ext_descriptions.ext_description:
A grouped_requirements_property is a type of and a type of that implements the ARM concepts of
and .
If the grouped_requirements_property has a group name of 'item restricted requirements property', it shall be assigned to exactly one item.

If the grouped_requirements_property has a group name of 'layout spacing requirements property', it shall be assigned to exactly two design_objects with a name of 'assembly module assembly component', 'assembly module component terminal', 'assembly module component', 'assembly module macro component join terminal', 'assembly module macro component', 'assembly module', 'bare die component terminal', 'bare die component', 'bonded conductive base blind via', 'buried via', 'cable component', 'component feature', 'component mounting feature', 'component termination passage and contact size dependent land', 'component termination passage and contact size dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage dependent land', 'component termination passage dependent non functional land', 'component termination passage interface terminal', 'component termination passage join terminal', 'component termination passage', 'conductive interconnect element terminal', 'conductive interconnect element with pre defined transitions', 'conductive interconnect element with user defined single transition', 'connected area component', 'contact size dependent land', 'contact size dependent non functional land', 'cutout edge segment', 'cutout', 'dielectric material passage', 'electrical isolation laminate component', 'embedded component terminal', 'fiducial', 'fill area', 'filled area material removal laminate component', 'inter stratum feature', 'interconnect component interface terminal', 'interconnect component join terminal', 'interconnect module assembly component', 'interconnect module component stratum based terminal', 'interconnect module component surface feature', 'interconnect module component terminal', 'interconnect module component', 'interconnect module edge segment', 'interconnect module edge', 'interconnect module macro component join terminal', 'interconnect module macro component', 'interface access material removal laminate component', 'interface access stratum feature template component', 'interface component', 'interfacial connection', 'internal probe access area', 'join two physical connectivity definition supporting inter stratum feature', 'join two physical connectivity definition supporting printed component', 'laminate component', 'laminate text component', 'laminate text string component', 'land interface terminal', 'land join terminal', 'land', 'material removal laminate component', 'minimally defined component terminal', 'movable packaged component join terminal', 'multi layer material removal laminate component', 'multi layer stratum feature template component', 'non conductive base blind via', 'non functional land interface terminal', 'non functional land join terminal', 'non functional land', 'packaged component join terminal', 'packaged component', 'packaged connector component interface terminal', 'packaged connector component', 'partially plated cutout', 'partially plated interconnect module edge', 'physical component', 'physical connectivity interrupting cutout', 'physical laminate component', 'physical network supporting inter stratum feature', 'plated conductive base blind via', 'plated cutout edge segment', 'plated cutout', 'plated interconnect module edge segment', 'plated interconnect module edge', 'plated passage or unsupported passage', 'plated passage', 'primary stratum indicator symbol', 'printed component join terminal', 'printed connector component interface terminal', 'probe access area', 'routed interconnect component', 'routed physical component', 'special symbol laminate component', 'stratum feature template component', 'stratum feature', 'thermal isolation laminate component', 'unrouted conductive interconnect element', 'unsupported passage dependent non functional land', 'unsupported passage', 'via and contact size dependent land', 'via and contact size dependent non functional land', 'via dependent land', 'via dependent non functional land', 'via terminal' or 'via'.
If the grouped_requirements_property has a group name of 'layout spacing requirements property', it shall be assigned to exactly one with a description of 'dependent design object category'.
If the grouped_requirements_property has a group name of 'layout spacing requirements property', it shall be assigned to exactly one with a description of 'reference design object category'.

ext_description.p: A land_physical_template is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The land_physical_template shall have a reference of at most one document that is constrained by a 'pre defined classification code'.
The land_physical_template shall be used to relate at least one to specify the 'access mechanism'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size based', 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', or 'default attachment size and via based', it shall be to relate no more than one with a name of 'connection zone' as the 'minimum attachment region size'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size based', 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', or 'default attachment size and via based', it shall be to relate no more than one with a name of 'connection zone' as the 'maximum attachment region size'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default component termination passage based' or 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', it shall relate to a with a description of 'default component termination passage definition' to specify the 'technology usage'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', 'default attachment size based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default component termination passage based', 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based', it shall relate to a as the 'of stratum technology'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default component termination passage based', 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based', it shall have a representation that contains exactly two length_measure_with_units.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default component termination passage based', 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based', it shall have a representation that contains exactly one with a name of 'minimum fabrication allowance'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default component termination passage based', 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based', it shall have a representation that contains exactly one with a name of 'minimum annular ring'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default attachment size and component termination passage based', 'default attachment size and via based', 'default component termination passage based', 'default via based', or 'default unsupported passage based', it shall relate a to specify the 'technology usage'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default via based' or 'default attachment size and via based', it shall relate to a with a description of 'default via definition' to specify the 'technology usage'.

If the land_physical_template has a description of 'default unsupported passage', it shall relate to a with a description of 'default unsupported passage definition' to specify the 'technology usage'.

ext_description.p: A land_template_terminal is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The land_template_terminal shall have a description of either 'interface terminal' or 'land terminal'.

The land_template_terminal shall relate to zero or more with a name of 'connection zone' to specify the 'terminal connection zone' which may be described as a 'edge curve', 'edge point', 'surface area', or 'surface point'.

ext_description.p: A stratum_technology is a type of that implements the ARM concepts of:

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The stratum_technology shall have exactly one material designation.
The stratum_technology shall have at most one representation with a name of 'stiffness class representation'.
The stratum_technology shall have exactly one representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation'.

Exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'stiffness class representation' shall be a with a name of 'laminate stiffness class' and a description of 'fluid like', 'conformal coat', or 'stiff laminate'.
The stratum_technology shall have at least two and at most eight items in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation'.

The items in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall have a name of either 'documentation layer purpose', 'design layer purpose', 'design layer position', 'maximum feature size requirement', 'minimum finished feature spacing', 'minimum finished feature size', 'maximum stratum thickness', or 'minimum stratum thickness'.
Exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum finished feature size'.
Exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'maximum stratum thickness'.
Exactly one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum stratum thickness'.
At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'maximum feature size requirement'.
At most one item in the representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' of a stratum_technology shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum finished feature spacing'.

If the stratum_technology has a description of 'documentation layer', exactly one item in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' shall be a with a name of 'layer purpose'.

If the stratum_technology has a description of 'design layer', exactly one item in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' shall be a and a with a name of 'minimum finished feature spacing'.

If the stratum_technology has a description of 'design layer', exactly one item in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' shall be a with a name of 'layer purpose' and a description of 'power or ground', 'other signal', or 'lands only'.

If the stratum_technology has a description of 'design layer', exactly one item in its representation with a name of 'physical characteristics representation' shall be a with a name of 'layer position' and a description of 'primary', 'secondary', 'all', 'external' or 'internal'.
If the description attribute exists, it shall be either 'design layer' or 'documentation layer'.
The name shall be unique.

ext_description.p: A stratum_technology_link is a type of that implements the ARM concept of

ext_descriptions.ext_description: The stratum_technology_link shall not relate to the same definition through the related and relating attributes.
The stratum_technology_link shall not be any other subtype of or .
The stratum_technology_link shall reference only a through the related attribute.
The stratum_technology_link shall reference only a through the relating attribute.
The stratum_technology_link name inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_technology_link description inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_technology_link name inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_technology_link description inherited from shall be blank.
The stratum_technology_link shall be referenced exactly once by a that has a description of 'printed part template'.
The stratum_technology_link shall be referenced as a no more than once by another stratum_technology_link.
The stratum_technology_link shall be referenced as a no more than once by another stratum_technology_link.

ext_description.p: The layout_spacing_requirement_occurrence_unique_constraint rule constrains population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the combination of ARM and ARM attributes shall be unique within the population.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: Every instance of must have a unique combination of name attribute where the has a description of 'dependent design object category' and name attribute where the has a description of 'reference design object category' and the characterized_objects are members of an 's items.definition and the 's is the .
The land_physical_template_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , so that the ARM attribute shall be unique within the population.

Every instance of must have a unique entity with a of 'predefined classification code' where the document_usage_constraint's attribute references the same entity as an applied_document_reference's attribute and the is a member of the applied_document_reference's .
The land_template_terminal_unique_constraint rule constrains the population members, that fill the role of ARM , so the combination of ARM and ARM shall be unique within the population.

Every instance of with a description of either 'interface terminal' or 'join terminal' must have a unique combination of name attribute and entity where the is related to the by a with a name of 'associated definition'.
